game.name: A Little Physics Roguelike
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 마우스 전용 옵션, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In A Little Physics Roguelike aim to grab the best equipment, then build your unique board with a variety of item to defeat cute enemies.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In A Little Physics Roguelike aim to grab the best equipment, then build your unique board with a variety of item to defeat cute enemies.
